intro: Stillingia brevifolia, commonly known as the shortleaf stillingia, is a flowering plant native to the eastern United States. Its leaves are alternate, simple, and often have a slightly hairy texture. Stillingia brevifolia is typically found in moist, wooded areas and is considered a rare and endangered species in many parts of its range.
